official_title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 200 South Washington Street in Alexandria, Virginia, as the "Martin V. B. Bostetter, Jr. United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse at 200 South Washington Street in Alexandria, Virginia, as the Martin V. B. Bostetter, Jr. United States Courthouse.
